page.title: 15Family life on a saturday.
page.content: Saturday 6th July 85.My mam walks into the bedroom and wakes me up.I went and got ready and then woke up my brother. We went into the kitchen where my mam was making the breakfast.When we had all eaten our breakfast we went to watch t.v.At about 10:00 clock we went up town.We went to park the car in the Fine Fare car park.We were on the top floor so we went down in the lift.When we got to the bottom we went into Fine Fare.When we came out we went to Little Woods and then we went home.When we got home I set the table and looked after my little brother Matthew while my big brother Adrian helped my mam and dad do the dinner.After dinner we went for a walk down the river Caldew.There is a path that runs beside the river.We go there often because it takes up most of the afternoon.Then after (see page 18)
